price: 161. Ken toobokoyti Nabii Luut Yallak mameesittaanaa ? keenik iyye waqdi.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum lūṭun alā tattaqūna
